pages.text: Delving into the art, many will find themselves limited to what power they can muster with normal materials. $(br)Thankfully, times of old have left plenty of relics drawing from higher powers, which will be outlined here.

pages.title: Incantation
pages.text: The Gate-and-Key isn't primarily worshipped in this world, not anymore; however, older civilizations have left one particularly powerful and commonly used incantation, able to hold an exact position in space.$(br)Using this binds it to the position of an Octagram, which may be used in practices such as the $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_teleport)$(marked)Rite of the Open Way.$()

An alchemically-created pearl that shines a multitude of colours. It is said to resemble the orbs of the Gate-and-Key, and thus contains an atom of his power. However, it is a fragile object and will be destroyed in the rite.
